Package org.apache.taverna.reference.impl.external.object

Support for representation of inlined objects as references.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BooleanToStringReference
    Convert a java.lang.Boolean to a StringReference.
    ByteArrayToByteArrayReference
    Convert a byte[] to a ByteArrayReference
    CharacterToStringReference
    Convert a Character to a StringReference.
    InlineByteArrayReference
    A reference implementation that inlines an array of bytes.
    InlineByteArrayReferenceBuilder
    Build an InlineByteArrayReference from an InputStream
    InlineByteToInlineStringTranslator  
    InlineStringReference
    Contains and references a String value
    InlineStringReferenceBuilder
    Build an InlineStringReference from an InputStream
    InlineStringToInlineByteTranslator  
    NumberToStringReference
    Convert a java.lang.Number to a StringReference.
    StreamToBooleanConverter  
    StreamToByteArrayConverter
    Build a byte[] from an InputStream
    StreamToDoubleConverter  
    StreamToIntegerConverter  
    StreamToStringConverter
    Build a String from an InputStream
    StreamToVMObjectReferenceConverter
    Builds a VMObjectReference from an InputStream.
    StringToStringReference
    Convert a String to a StringReference
    VMObjectReference
    Implementation of ExternalReferenceSPI used to refer to objects in the local virtual machine.

Package org.apache.taverna.reference.impl.external.object Description

Support for representation of inlined objects as references. Replaces the old Literal support
